title: All-Star Weekend Spectacular
description:
Jalen & Jacoby tackle All-Star Weekend, the highs of the game, the lows of the dunk contest, and the mingling of the NBA's greatest legends, which led to MJ challenging Magic to some one-on-one. Plus, you hear Jalen Rose's respond to seeing his friend - Juwan - Howard involved in an altercation after Michigan's game with Wisconsin. You do NOT want to miss this. 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
